mapper.sql: SELECT withdraw_id, pan_withdraw.user_id, sys_user.user_name user_name, card_id, pan_withdraw.create_time, amount, fee, bank_code, sys_user.agent_id, beneficiary_name, bank_name, card_name, card_no, resp_desc, beneficiary_no, beneficiary_mobile, beneficiary_email, request_no, order_no, pan_withdraw.STATUS, oder_time, pan_withdraw.remark, pan_withdraw.channel_id FROM pan_withdraw LEFT JOIN sys_user ON sys_user.user_id = pan_withdraw.user_id
mapper.insert:
insert into pan_withdraw
user_id, card_id, amount, fee, bank_code, beneficiary_name, bank_name, card_name, card_no, beneficiary_no, beneficiary_mobile, beneficiary_email, request_no, order_no, status, remark, channel_id, create_time

mapper.select: select sum(amount+fee) from pan_withdraw where user_id=#{userId} and (status='Pending' or status='In progress');
select sum(amount+fee) from pan_withdraw where status = 'Completed'
select sum(amount+fee) from pan_withdraw where DATE_FORMAT(oder_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE() and status = 'Completed'

SELECT sum( wi.amount+wi.fee ) amount FROM pan_withdraw wi LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON wi.user_id = u.user_id WHERE wi.STATUS = 'Completed' AND ( u.parent_id = #{userId} OR u.grand_id = #{userId} OR u.great_grand_id = #{userId})
